long_description: The Yakima KeelOver canoe carrier hauls your boat with ease and affordability. Durable saddles feature over-molded rubber to cushion the canoe gunwales while providing stability. Universal design of saddles fits directly to Whispbar, round, square and most factory bars. Yakima KeelOver includes 4 saddles, straps, and bow/stern tie-downs to carry 1 boat. Quick and easy, tool-free installation.
short_description: The Yakima KeelOver canoe carrier hauls your boat with ease and affordability.
